instructions.title: How to use with Notion

steps.1: Click the "Open in Notion" button to open a new Notion page
steps.2: Click "Copy" to copy all the summary content
steps.3: Paste the content into your Notion page
steps.4: The Markdown formatting will be automatically applied
steps.5: Save your Notion page and organize it in your workspace

instructions.note: Notion supports Markdown natively, so your summary will keep its formatting when pasted.

instructions.title: How to get a Google Gemini API Key
instructions.description: Follow these steps to obtain your own API key from Google AI Studio
instructions.whatIs: What is a Google Gemini API Key?
instructions.apiDescription: The Google Gemini API Key allows you to use Google's AI capabilities to process your documents and generate summaries and flashcards. Each user needs their own API key.

step1.title: Go to Google AI Studio website
step1.description: Visit aistudio.google.com and sign in with your Google account

step2.title: Navigate to API Keys
step2.description: In the left sidebar, click on 'Get API key'

step3.title: Create a new API key
step3.description: Click on 'Create API key' and give it a name like 'Study App'

step4.title: Copy your API key
step4.description: Copy your new API key and paste it in the field above
